trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: 실행 중인 워크플로 인스턴스를 종료를 발생 시킵니다는 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>이벤트에서 호스트 및 오류 정보를 보고 합니다.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로가 종료 되 면 다시 시작할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 종료를 초래한 예외를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
If only Exception is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 만 예외를 설정한 경우 해당 예외가 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and Exception are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and Exception is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 모두 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>예외 설정, 즉 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>전달 됩니다 지정 된 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, 예외는 예외로 설정 되어 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>속성.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스 종료 이유가 포함 문자열 입력된 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only Reason is set.
trans-unit.target: 에 전달 되는 예외 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>는 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>만 이유 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.

If both Reason and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified Reason, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이유 둘 다 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>설정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>지정한 이유 함께 전달 되 면 및 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>예외의로 설정 되어 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>속성.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
